<comment id="Comment_5" label="Comment_5" text="Fun fact : if you try to reactivate the force grab simultaneously for the two Rays (by splitting the token in SEVEN), one of the two object will become None during the runtime and causing an error" height="89,09094" width="283,6364" isFolded="false"><position x="4672,757" y="-802,059" /></comment>

<comment id="Comment_6" label="Comment_6" text="We may add a little delay before reactivating the hands to avoid problems" height="87" width="185" isFolded="false"><position x="3916,249" y="-72,409" /></comment>

<comment id="Comment_7" label="Comment_7" text="Because the mold_with_clay mesh isn't symetrical, and we
are too lazy to fix it" height="82,54546" width="167,2727" isFolded="false"><position x="2000,411" y="-899,2174" /></comment>

<comment id="Comment_8" label="Comment_8" text="May want to create scripts that will do a lot of effectors only things, since it is very messy when using SEVEN only" height="85,72727" width="325" isFolded="false"><position x="2017,117" y="-1115,094" /></comment>
